text:
Hi Guys!

`module.js` file is included in `module.html` file automatically. But I need to load it manually from template. How can I do that? I know how to load it manually, but how to tell HubSpot not to include `module.js` file on the page automatically?
Is there any way to limit the elements that can be added by the WYSIWYG in a particular field? Like if I wanted to limit a field to only plain text and <a> links?
